verbs.description: ham n tater bake [V: get] [ARG2: ready for a gourmet loaded baked potato in casserole form] this is so good i ca n’t resist making it several times a month and it a quick and easy dish for company too my sister gave me the recipe and i ’m always happy to pass it along —peggy grieme pinehurst north carolina
